data.title: Cold Drinks on the Patio with Friends
data.text:
Trops is one of my favorite places to go in Columbia. It's a great happy hour spot for after work. Each location has a patio with plenty of seating but the one downtown is the best for people watching. 
The only food they serve is popcorn which is a bummer but there's all kinds of places within walking distance to eat.

data.title: Great prices
data.text: We love the frozen drinks and the prices are great. I would highly recommend the double shot though as the drinks seem a little weak. We have I joyed all the flavored drinks we have tried.

data.title: Younger crowd and Drinks are weak
data.text: I'm not a slushy fan, I get brain freeze.  But when visiting with others, it's seems to me it's a place to pick up a drink in a Styrofoam cup.  I didn't find the drinks very strong, and it was loud - had to holler at the person standing next to me to talk.

data.title: Great cool drinks
data.text: This is an experience all on it own.  Of course you can try all the drinks before you decide on the one that you want and then sit there and drink it.  good......

data.title: If you love frozen Drinks!  come here
data.text: This is an awesome way to serve up some frozen drinks.  So many flavors.  Great patio for a great summer time evening.

data.title: Awesome cocktail-slushees!  Worth the wait if there is a line.
data.text: Went here with a friend on a sunny spring afternoon.  Got to sample a couple different flavors of the slushees, and ended up mixing two flavors -- awesome cocktail treat on a warm day, very friendly and helpful staff.

data.title: Fruity Drinks Galore!
data.text: If you dig fruity frozen drinks then this is the spot for you. Great for meeting friends, super casual.

data.title: Great drinks at a great value
data.text: Trops serves up great drinks at great prices compared to all the bars in town.  The outside patio is very nice as there is not a lot of room inside.  57Chevy is a great drink although it is a good idea to try a couple before you decide on what you want and add a shot if you don't find the drinks strong enough for your taste.

data.title: Always my favorite :)
data.text: I have been a long-time lover of Tropical Liqueurs and I don't see that changing! I love all their drinks and the environment. I am not the best at mixing my own drinks, but theirs are always perfect, fabulous, and being able to stop and grab a drink and take it home to enjoy (or freeze and enjoy after a rough day) definitely makes it a frequent 'go-to' for me, even though I live an hour away!!

data.title: A Columbia institution
data.text: I've been going here since I was in college, and my order doesn't change. Toasted almond: Kahlua, amaretto, and ice cream. I rest my case.

data.title: A must stop
data.text: This is the best invention known to man. Icee liquor drinks. So wonderful! We commonly get these before tailgating, camping, etc. They have a lot of drinks to choose from and they change a couple out regularly so as to rotate be 2 mixes in. Remember, these go down really easy so pay attention to what is in them. One word,  Everclear. Prices are reasonable and you can easily quickly get your buzz on.

data.title: fun
data.text: This place was fun and got to try different kinds of frozen drinks.  I got the red bull drink, it wasn't that great but still different.  This is definitely a college type of bar, and like the laid back atmosphere and different drink choices.

data.title: BEST PLACE FOR DRINKS!
data.text: This is the place to get really good frozen drinks, which are my fave!  Many different flavors and combinations! Great place to hang out with friends and enjoy great drinks at  a really good price!

data.title: Alcoholic Slushes
data.text: I think the title of this review says it all. These are great to pick up before a day at the pool! With a variety of sizes and shots, you'll find one to get your buzz started!

data.title: Always a summer must
data.text:
So the downtown location will always be preferred in my mind, as it has so many nice food options close. They always welcome outside food since they don't offer any, and the downtown location has Wise Guys immediately next door and many other options just across Broadway or a block or two down. 

The drinks are alcoholic slushies - each has their own unique flavor and liquor mixture, and most are really quite good. The strawberry daiquiri was a new flavor for me this visit, and it was good - not great. Try the red/white/blue three-way - the best I've tried yet. Sweet Tart is good but too sweet, like some of their flavors. Use Silver Bullet to cut the sweetness on the flavors that come off too sweet to you, and you've got yourself a great drink. 

Always great!

data.title: Best frozen mix drinks
data.text: Always stop here when I go to Columbia, awesome frozen cocktails. You can mix flavors however you want too. Get a card to get punched for a free one after so many purchases.

data.title: Too Fun!
data.text: My friend told me that there was a place in Columbia with "adult slushes".  I thought it sounded a little goofy but we decided to give it a try.  A bunch of 35 year old women had a lot of giggles tasting the slush flavors and taking pictures with the pirate statue.  A small slush is only $4 and they are very tasty.  I would definitely come back here.  It was a different experience than your normal bar for sure!

data.title: Deliciously Strong Drinks
data.text: Came into town with some friends for the Mizzou game, and we went here twice. The Amaretto Sour was phenom (if you like this drink of course). Tiger Paw and Sweet Tart were two other favorites. Silver Bullet is the strongest, and you can do 1/2 of that with a sweeter flavor too. Definitely expect a long line on game day, but it moves fast and there's a lot of seating. Enjoy!

data.title: Best slushy ever
data.text: Trops is a Columbia favorite. If you see someone with a white styrofoam cup and red straw out, you know it's a trops and you're instantly jealous. Numerous drink choices and they don't skimp of the alcohol. My favorite is the sweet tart. Don't forget to get your punch card.

data.title: adult slurpee
data.text: They have several choices and do not skimp on the alcohol. I had the 57 chevy and it was really good. We got our drinks to go but several people were enjoying the outdoor seating area. The prices are great for what you get and the service was good.
